Package cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models

Interface IGameBoard

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsGameBoard, GameBoard, GameBoardMem
    public interface IGameBoard
    This the interface for a GameBoard object it contains functions that manipulate the 2D that is initialized by the constructor. The beginning of the 2D array is classified as (0,0), and places tokens from the bottom up.
    Constraints:
    maxRow >= 1 && maxColumn >= 1, 1 <= numToWin <= (maxRow && maxColumn)

    • Method Detail

      • getNumRows

        int getNumRows()
        This function returns the number of rows in a Gameboard object
        Returns:
        number of rows in GameBoard object
        Post:
        getNumRows = #numRows

      • getNumColumns

        int getNumColumns()
        This function returns the number of columns in the Gameboard
        Returns:
        the maximum number of columns
        Post:
        getNumColumns = maxColumn

      • getNumToWin

        int getNumToWin()
        This function returns the amount of continuous tokens needed to win
        Returns:
        the maximum number of tokens needed horizontally, diagonally or vertically to win as defined by the user
        Post:
        getNumToWin = numToWin

      • checkIfFree

        default boolean checkIfFree​(int c)
        This function returns true if the column can accept another token and false otherwise
        Parameters:
        c - The token position
        Returns:
        true iff the column != FULL
        Pre:
        c <= c < maxColumn
        Post:
        Function returns false iff (c > the column size) || function returns true iff (c <= maxColumn), checkIfFree iff myBoard[maxRow] = ' ' AND myBoard = #myBoard AND GamedBoard = #Gameboard AND winCondition = #winCondition AND playAgain = #playAgain

      • placeToken

        void placeToken​(char p,
                int c)
        This function places the character p in column c. The token will be placed in the lowest available row in column c
        Parameters:
        p - The character to be placed
        c - The position in the column
        Pre:
        c <= the column size, checkIfFree == true
        Post:
        iff p.c <= maxColumn [ GameBoard will reflect new token placement at the lowest available row ] AND winCondition = #winCondition AND playAgain = #playAgain AND GameBoard = #GameBoard + 1, iff p.c > maxColumn then GameBoard = #GameBoard AND winCondition = #winCondition AND playAgain = #playAgain

      • checkHorizWin

        default boolean checkHorizWin​(BoardPosition pos,
                              char p)
        This function checks to see if the last token placed resulted in numToWin in a row horizontally
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the token on the board
        p - The player
        Returns:
        winCondition == true iff row contains 5 of the same tokens in uninterrupted row
        Pre:
        A token has been placed
        Post:
        iff winCondition == true if pos is the last to make up the numToWin of consecutive same markers needed to win horizontally AND GameBoard = #GameBoard AND playAgain = #playAgain, iff winCondition == false if pos is not the last to make up the numToWin of consecutive same markers needed to win horizontally AND GameBoard = #GameBoard AND playAgain = #playAgain

      • checkVertWin

        default boolean checkVertWin​(BoardPosition pos,
                             char p)
        This function checks to see if the last token placed resulted in numToWin in a row vertically
        Parameters:
        pos - The position on game board of the latest play
        p - The marker at pos
        Returns:
        winCondition == true iff column contains numToWin of the same tokens in uninterrupted column
        Pre:
        A token has been placed, pos The position on game board of the latest play
        Post:
        iff winCondition == true if pos is the last to make up the numToWin of consecutive same markers needed to win vertically AND GameBoard = #GameBoard AND playAgain = #playAgain, iff winCondition == false if pos is not the last to make up the numToWin of consecutive same markers needed to win vertically AND GameBoard = #GameBoard AND playAgain = #playAgain

      • checkDiagWin

        default boolean checkDiagWin​(BoardPosition pos,
                             char p)
        This function checks to see if the last token placed resulted in numToWin in a row diagonally
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the token on the board
        p - The player
        Returns:
        winCondition == true iff diagonal contains numToWin of the same tokens in uninterrupted diagonal
        Pre:
        A token has been placed
        Post:
        iff winCondition == true if pos is the last to make up the numToWin of consecutive same markers needed to win diagonally AND GameBoard = #GameBoard AND playAgain = #playAgain, iff winCondition == false if pos is not the last to make up the numToWin of consecutive same markers needed to win diagonally AND GameBoard = #GameBoard AND playAgain = #playAgain

      • whatsAtPos

        char whatsAtPos​(BoardPosition pos)
        This function checks to see what is in the game board a specific position
        Parameters:
        pos - The GameBoard position
        Returns:
        'X' || 'O' iff player1 token is at pos
        Pre:
        0 <= pos.getRow() < maxRow && 0 <= pos.getColumn() < maxColumn
        Post:
        The token character is returned AND GameBoard = #GameBoard AND winCondition = #winCondition AND playAgain = #playAgain

      • isPlayerAtPos

        default boolean isPlayerAtPos​(BoardPosition pos,
                              char p)
        This function checks to see if the player is at a certain position
        Parameters:
        pos - The GameBoard position
        p - The player
        Returns:
        true iff p exists at pos
        Pre:
        0 <= pos.getRow() < maxRow && 0 <= pos.getColumn() < maxColumn
        Post:
        true is returned iff p exists at pos OR false is returned iff p does not exist at post AND GameBoard = #GameBoard AND winCondition = #winCondition AND playAgain = #playAgain

      • checkForWin

        default boolean checkForWin​(int c)
        This function checks if a player has won
        Parameters:
        c - The token's column position
        Returns:
        true iff player's tokens == numToWin,
        Pre:
        0 <= c < maxCol
        Post:
        checkForWin = true iff the player won horizontally, diagonally, or vertically checkForWin = false iff the player has not won horizontally, diagonally, or vertically

      • checkTie

        default boolean checkTie()
        This function checks if the game has resulted in a tie
        Returns:
        true iff GameBoard is full and has no winner
        Pre:
        winCondition == false, All board positions have been filled
        Post:
        if true is returned then end game OR if false is returned and GameBoard != full then continue playing AND GameBoard = #GameBoard AND winCondition = #winCondition AND playAgain = #playAgain
